values: 温暖的；暖和的；保暖的；热情的；热心的；友好的；亲切的；热烈的；强烈的；接近正确的；接近目标的；保温的；隔热的；使人感到温馨的；温馨的；温情的；温暖色调的；暖色调的；即将猜中（发现或找到）
使温暖；变暖；变暖和；加热；预热；使变得更友好；变得更温情；激发（兴趣或感情）；热身；温馨地欢迎（招待）；（逐渐）增温；（对某事）产生兴趣；（对某人）感到友好或亲切
温暖的地方；取暖处；加热；取暖；温暖；舒适的环境；暖意；温馨处
<非正式>保暖地；使人暖和地；温暖地

synonym.mean: 使…兴奋；使…温暖；使…感兴趣

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 取暖器；加热器；加热工人

word_mean_info__list.difference: 通常指温度不太高，介于hot与cold之间，不太热也不太凉，给人以舒适感。
最普通用词，指温度很高，往往有灼热、滚烫含义。
暗示热源是火，多用于夸张，指像火烧一样热。

word_group.brief_definition: 进行热身；作准备练习；达到有效工作温度；预热；更加活泼；更具活力
保暖；保持温热；保持温暖
暖和的衣服；保暖的衣服
感情上的强烈反应；意在引起感情上强烈反应的事物
感情上的强烈反应；意在引起感情上强烈反应的事物
穿上许多衣服保暖；穿得暖和
暖身体育活动；危险的冲突
厚呢短大衣，粗呢短外套

word_group.phrase: warm the cockles of one's heart

word_group.brief_definition: 穿上许多衣服保暖；穿得暖和

bilingual.target: 温暖的泪水顺着她的脸颊流下。

bilingual.source: But when the pets come here we give them food and a warm bed.
bilingual.target: 但是当宠物来到这里时，我们给它们食物和温暖的床。

bilingual.source: "I think they're crazy," Samuel said to him, one warm summer's day.
bilingual.target: “我觉得他们疯了，”塞缪尔在一个温暖的夏日对他说。

bilingual.source: When I was tired and hungry, she gave me food and warm arms to sleep in.
bilingual.target: 当我又累又饿时，她给我食物和温暖的怀抱让我入睡。

bilingual.source: Spring was coming now and the warm weather was melting the ice between the islands.
bilingual.target: 春天来了，温暖的天气正在融化岛屿之间的冰。
她给了我一个温暖的拥抱。
她给了我一个温暖的微笑。
她给我织了一件温暖的开衫。

bilingual.source: She gave her friend a warm hug.
bilingual.target: 她给了她的朋友一个温暖的拥抱。

yingyinNormal.en: Given the weather, the one thing Harvard hasn't figured out how to control, some of your other classmates are at someplace warm with a hot cocoa.
yingyinNormal.zh: 由于天气，这种哈佛还没有弄清如何控制的现象，还有同学正在温暖的地方喝热可可饮料。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: Rising from the warm shores of the Persian Gulf and the shifting sands of the Arabian Desert, is the city of Dubai, the largest emirate in the United Arab Emirates.
yingyinNormal.zh: 迪拜市位处温暖的波斯湾沿岸及阿拉伯沙漠的流沙之上，是阿联酋最大的酋长国。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, not so long ago I was on a mission that meant certain death, my death! And now I'm back, in a nice warm office, with my big brother and are those ginger nuts? Oh, God. LOVE ginger nuts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不久前，我还在执行死亡任务，我的死亡，现在我回来了，在一间温暖的办公室里，和我的哥哥，还有，那是姜饼吗？上帝啊，爱死姜饼了。

yingyinNormal.en: Hi, I'm Olaf and I like warm hugs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嗨，我是喜欢温暖拥抱的雪宝。

yingyinNormal.en: Hi, I'm Olaf and I like warm hugs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嗨，我是喜欢温暖拥抱的雪宝。

yingyinNormal.en: Is the water cold? It's lovely and warm!
yingyinNormal.zh: 海水冷不冷呀？暖暖的，很舒服！

yingyinNormal.en: It's quite windy. Let's play a game to keep warm.
yingyinNormal.zh: 风真大。我们来玩个游戏保持温暖吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Then gradually whisk in the warm milk and cream mix.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后倒入牛奶和奶油的混合物，搅拌均匀。

yingyinNormal.en: Everyone nice and warm? Yes, Daddy Pig! Then let's go!
yingyinNormal.zh: 大家都感觉舒服暖和了吗？是的，猪爸爸！那么我们出发吧！

yingyinNormal.en: George. Here are some nice warm milk to help you sleep. The warm milk makes George feel very very sleepy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治喝杯热牛奶吧，这样你就能好好睡了。喝了热牛奶，乔治感觉非常非常困。

yingyinNormal.en: The snowman needs some clothes to keep him warm. George has found some clothes to keep the snowman nice and warm!
yingyinNormal.zh: 看来雪人需要穿一件衣服，这样就不冷了。乔治找来一些衣服这样雪人就不冷了！

yingyinNormal.en: To start with, I have my beautiful warm wheat flour which I've never used warm flour before, straight from the mill.
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先，我先处理还温热的面粉我之前还没用过直接从磨坊里拿来的温的面粉。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy Pig has some warm soapy water to wash the car.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爸爸接了一些可以用来洗车的温水。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy Pig has some warm soapy water to wash the car.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爸爸接了一些可以用来洗车的温水。

yingyinNormal.en: Hi! Good morning, Master! I thought I'd warm up a little.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嗨，早安师父，我在暖身。

yingyinNormal.en: Ain't much of a game. That was a warm up. Now you go. I don't know.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这游戏不怎么好玩啊，不过热身而已，该你问了。不知道说啥。

yingyinNormal.en: It's freezing cold! It is cold! Quick! Let's get our warm clothes on!
yingyinNormal.zh: 冻死人了！好冷啊！快点！我们把厚衣服穿上吧！

yingyinNormal.en: You're gonna die an old lady, warm in her bed. Not here. Not this night.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你会长命百岁，寿终正寝，不会死在这里的，不会像是今晚如此的下场。

yingyinNormal.en: No. He cut open a tauntaun and used its internal body heat to warm him up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有，他切开一只圣兽用它内部的体热给他取暖。

yingyinNormal.en: In my stomach. It's all warm. I always had a knot there, and now it's gone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在我的胃里，暖暖的，我以前老是胃疼，现在不会了。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 温暖的(地方); 使暖和
即将猜中的; 接近答案的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 加温；升温；暖和；变暖
n. 暖和；温暖；暖热；热情；热心；激动；仁慈

word_family.mean: adj. 温暖的；热情的；多情的；亲切的；快要发现的；即将猜中的；暖和的；强烈的；保温的；保暖的

sense_info_list.zh: 温暖的(地方); 使暖和

examination_example.sentence: Believe it or not, a <highlight>warm</highlight> embrace might even help you avoid getting sick this winter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 信不信由你，一个温暖的拥抱甚至有可能帮助你避免在这个冬天生病。

sense_info_list.en: become more interested than at first
of a color in the range yellow through orange to red
used to say that sb has almost guessed the answer to sth or that they have almost found sb/sth that has been hidden
sense_info_list.zh: 即将猜中的; 接近答案的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 暖和；温暖；暖热；热情；热心；激动；仁慈

word_family.mean: adj. 温暖的；热情的；多情的；亲切的；快要发现的；即将猜中的；暖和的；强烈的；保温的；保暖的

examination_example.sentence: The company blamed much of the poor performance in November and December on unseasonably <highlight>warm</highlight> weather.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该公司将11月和12月的糟糕表现归咎于异常温暖的天气。

word_usage.usage:
warm作“(使)变暖”解时，“加热某物”用warm sth.表达；warm作不及物动词时，须用主动语态的warm (up)表达被动意义。
示例：房间很快就会暖和起来。
误 The room will be warmed up soon.
正 The room will warm up soon.

n. 暖和；温暖；暖热；热情；热心；激动；仁慈

word_family.mean: adj. 温暖的；热情的；多情的；亲切的；快要发现的；即将猜中的；暖和的；强烈的；保温的；保暖的

examination_example.sentence: Now, of course, we know that whatever you call it, human behavior is <highlight>warming</highlight> the planet, with grave consequences ahead.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，当然，我们知道，不管你怎么称呼它，人类的行为正在使地球变暖，并将带来严重的后果。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Warm</highlight> currents in the ocean.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 海洋中的暖流。

examination_example.sentence: Drivers should make sure they're prepared for their journey with <highlight>warm</highlight> clothing, food and drink, sufficient fuel and a charged mobile phone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 司机们应该确保他们已经为旅途做好准备，准备好保暖的衣服、食物和饮料、充足的燃料和充了电的手机。

word_usage.usage:
warm作“(使)变暖”解时，“加热某物”用warm sth.表达；warm作不及物动词时，须用主动语态的warm (up)表达被动意义。
示例：房间很快就会暖和起来。
误 The room will be warmed up soon.
正 The room will warm up soon.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 加温；升温；暖和；变暖
adv. 温暖地；亲切地；热烈地；热情地；热心地
n. 暖和；温暖；暖热；热情；热心；激动；仁慈

word_family.mean: adj. 温暖的；热情的；多情的；亲切的；快要发现的；即将猜中的；暖和的；强烈的；保温的；保暖的

examination_example.sentence: Keep the room cool rather than <highlight>warm</highlight> to avoid feeling sleepy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 保持房间凉爽而不是温暖，以免感到困倦。

examination_example.sentence: As he was worried that it would be too <highlight>warm</highlight>, he laid it out on the table near an open window.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于担心天气太热，他把它放在桌子上，旁边开着窗户。

examination_example.sentence: I'd prefer a few degrees <highlight>warmer</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想再暖和几度。

examination_example.sentence: When the kits were completed, and ready to be sent overseas, the <highlight>warm</highlight> feeling I had was one I would never forget.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当装备完成并准备运往海外时，那种温暖的感觉令我终生难忘。

examination_example.sentence: A <highlight>warm</highlight>-hearted person.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个热心人。

examination_example.sentence: Rani's friendliness—her <highlight>warm</highlight> smile, her nods, her 'I'm here for you' attitude—were all silent signals that didn't travel through wires.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 拉尼的友善——她温暖的微笑，她的点头，她的“我在这里等你”的态度——都是无声的信号，不可能通过电线传递。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Warm</highlight> colors like yellow make food appear more appetizing, while cold colors make us feel less hungry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 黄色等暖色使食物看起来更开胃，而冷色使我们感觉不是那么饿。

examination_example.sentence: Research suggests <highlight>warm</highlight> colors fuel our appetites.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究表明暖色会刺激我们的食欲。

examination_example.sentence: As soon as the weather <highlight>warms</highlight> up, I have no doubt that the little one will be out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 天气一转暖，我毫不怀疑那个小家伙就会出去。

examination_example.sentence: The path to Dawson was covered with thirty feet of wet snow that could fall without <highlight>warming</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通往道森的小路上覆盖着30英尺厚的湿雪，即使天气不暖和，这些湿雪也会陷下去。

sense_info_list.zh: 感到热的; 使人热的
即将猜中的; 快要找到的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

n. 加温；升温；暖和；变暖

n. 取暖器；加热工人；加热器

word_family.mean: adj. 温暖的；热情的；多情的；亲切的；快要发现的；即将猜中的；暖和的；强烈的；保温的；保暖的

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 进行热身；作准备练习；达到有效工作温度；预热；更加活泼；更具活力
保暖；保持温热；保持温暖
暖和的衣服；保暖的衣服

examination_example.sentence: This is a machine to <highlight>warm</highlight> our feet in winter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是冬天暖脚的机器。

examination_example.sentence: Wait for the rain to stop and we'll enjoy the <highlight>warm</highlight> sunshine.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 等雨停了，我们将享受温暖的阳光。

examination_example.sentence: The Earth becomes too <highlight>warm</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 地球变得太温暖了。

examination_example.sentence: Jane is a <highlight>warm</highlight>-hearted girl.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 简是个热心肠的女孩。

examination_example.sentence: Not all countries are as <highlight>warm</highlight> as China.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 并非所有国家都像中国一样热情。

examination_example.sentence: Lulu is also a <highlight>warm</highlight>, smart and popular girl her friends eyes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Lulu也是她朋友眼中的一个热情、聪明、受欢迎的女孩。

examination_example.sentence: We all arrive as early as we can so that we have time to <highlight>warm</highlight> up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们都尽可能早地到达，以便我们有时间热身。

examination_example.sentence: But as the team toured around China, things started <highlight>warming</highlight> up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但随着团队在中国各地巡回演出，事情开始升温。

word_usage.usage:
warm作“(使)变暖”解时，“加热某物”用warm sth.表达；warm作不及物动词时，须用主动语态的warm (up)表达被动意义。
示例：房间很快就会暖和起来。
误 The room will be warmed up soon.
正 The room will warm up soon.
